TopicTitle: um3kCorp Multifunction Utility Panels v1.1 - New image gallery!

Articles.Content:
[table=width: 640]

[tr]

[td]

[/td]

[/tr]

[tr]

[td]

um3kCorp is pleased to announce the initial release of its newest

product, um3kCorp Multifunction Utility Panels. Available in an assortment of sizes, these sturdy, lightweight snap-together panels are perfect for almost any use. Manufactured from the very finest [probably not painted cardboard], they'll hold up to just about anything, all while producing minimal drag and zero lift. Additional features include impressive heat resistance and effective fuel transfer via capillary action. Wait no longer! Stock up today and let your imagination run wild![/td]

[/tr]

[tr]

[td]

Edited October 5, 2012 by um3k
Seems usefull. Thanks. will try.

Very useful.

Will you branch out into other shapes too?
Not quite sure what you mean by other shapes. Triangular panels? Hexagonal? That's conceivable. I'll look into it in the near future.
What about spherical, Pentagonal? I'd love to have my ship encased in a giant sphere so I could smash into stuff without a care in the world
Spherical is a little less conceivable (can't have concave collision meshes), but I could do an assortment of polygons. Geodesic domes, anyone?

Yes and also columns in the the shapes of Hexagons, octagons, half rounds, one quarter rounds, etc.

I was thinking of using them to make buildings for moon base construction.
I'll set my engineers to the task of developing transparent [probably not painted cardboard] for windows while I'm at it. R&D might take a little while.

... Geodesic domes, anyone?

Yes, please! (preferably colored white or gray)
If the mod gets developed again (HyperJump Mod), I will use this to create a MASSIVE GATE to the planets.
This would be awesome if it where possible to lob a bunch to a planet or Mun and Drag&Drop 'em together to form a big Outpost. Mmmmm, /me dreams on.

If the mod gets developed again (HyperJump Mod), I will use this to create a MASSIVE GATE to the planets.

"It goes on forever - and - oh my God - it's full of stars!"
Can you put more pics plz
Hexagons will allow all sorts of shapes in the near spherical range.
can this thing make power?
+1 for hexagons or honeycomb-like blocks
Thanks to the informative video I now know how Jeb builds roads!
That video is like some kind of warped Jeb in a box.

Can you put more pics plz

I may once I build some new things with it. Most of my creations were in 0.16 with an older version of the mod. I did put a video in OP you may want to check out, though.

can this thing make power?

No, but you can stick power-making things to it! These are structural panels, not solar panels.
Great love the panels, awesome for covering up a mun base + anything sticks to it like the wings I used to stick fuel tanks to.
THERE AWSOME BUT theres no textures?? if ya dont mind im gonna try to take a stab at adding some dark hd ones

THERE AWSOME BUT theres no textures?? if ya dont mind im gonna try to take a stab at adding some dark hd ones

Make all black ones and then drop a huge number of them into Jool and see what happens?
There are textures, but they are very faint. Look closely.

space elevator ideas pop in with this, only to achieve geosync and a rover to climb....
